medical_history.chief_complaint: Left-sided abdominal pain localized to the lower abdomen.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient awoke with left-sided abdominal pain today, which has become somewhat more diffuse. Also experienced a few days of mild left-sided back pain. Symptoms are gradual in onset, with moderate severity and dull quality. Associated symptoms include nausea without vomiting. Denies fevers or chills.
medical_history.family_history: Pancreatic cancer in father, cancer in mother.
